text.quest1a: We should leave soon, ___ the band begins at ten o'clock.
text.quest1b: Either Stace ___ Buffy will be asked to be keynote speaker.
text.quest2: Slim did not like the new drummer, ___ did Twiggs.
text.quest2a: Slim was excited, ___ today is the band contest.
text.quest2b: Stace phoned Barbie all day, ___ nobody was home.
